caption: The divine light first shone upon the world through baptism, miracles, and the proclamation of the Kingdom.
image_prompt: A triptych-style illustration depicting three key moments of divine revelation. Left panel: Jesus being baptized in the Jordan River with the Holy Spirit descending as a dove and heavenly light breaking through clouds. Center panel: The wedding at Cana showing Jesus transforming water into rich, red wine in stone jars as guests marvel. Right panel: Jesus preaching on a hillside to a diverse crowd with golden light emanating from him as he announces the Kingdom of God. The style combines Renaissance composition with the luminous quality of stained glass windows, featuring rich colors and divine light beams illuminating each scene.
